title: @Rioter
body: Is it possible to get the ocean week fizz icon, ill pay for it, i just love fizz and really want it. Thanks!

replies.body:
Hey DreadEcho,

There currently isn't a way to obtain the icon, they were temporarily available [earlier this year](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/icons-down-under) for a limited time.
50 Morde threads with 100s of views and comments and this guy gets a rioter  comment on the 1st go.   It honestly depressing

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ajxpxqn4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-16T21:09:10.082+0000)
>
> 50 Morde threads with 100s of views and comments and this guy gets a rioter  comment on the 1st go.   It honestly depressing

Rioters dont want to sound like a broken record. They will fix it eventually balancing this game is a bitch
i commend you normally when someone tries hijacking a post they get bi***d out, i commend you sir. (coming from a mordekaiser main.)

> [{quoted}](name=Mordepool,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ajxpxqn4,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-16T21:09:10.082+0000)
>
> 50 Morde threads with 100s of views and comments and this guy gets a rioter  comment on the 1st go.   It honestly depressing

1) Be happy for him.
2) I suppose Riot KateyKhaos could answer the treads on morde, but since game balance isnt her department what would be the point?

I am glad that Riot KateyKhaos  answers questions that have to do with her area of expertise!

No we all know Katey is an excellent riot representative  its just the disparity between 
Your 1 question answered quickly and thoughtfully.

And the outcries of hundreds of people. 

Sry for the hijack it was a knee jerk reaction brought on by immense feeling of neglect
